goal.tools.unittest.testsection.testconditions

Class Always

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.tools.unittest.testsection.testconditions.TestCondition
      • goal.tools.unittest.testsection.testconditions.Always

  • public class Always
extends TestCondition
    Always operator for LTL queries in EvaluateIn. The mental state condition evaluated by this operator should always hold during the execution of the actions in the EvaluateIn rule.
    Author:
    mpkorstanje

      • createEvaluator

        public TestConditionEvaluator createEvaluator(RunState<? extends ObservableDebugger> runstate,
                                     Substitution substitution)
        Description copied from class: TestCondition
        Provides an evaluator capable of evaluating the mental state query on a running agent. The runstate is provided as an argument because it is not available through the ObservableDebugger. This function should actually create the evaluator's implementation.
        Specified by:
        createEvaluator in class TestCondition
        Parameters:
        runstate - of the agent
        substitution - the substitution to share
        Returns:
        a new evaluator
